premium.name: Premium
premium.description: Gives you a sweet shiny badge along with numerous perks

face-mask.name: Face Mask
face-mask.description: Protects user from contracting krunkitis, unboxable from spins

antidote.name: Antidote xvi
antidote.description: Cures an infected user, obtainable from spins

slick.name: Slick's American Flag
slick.description: The greatest American patriot in all of Krunker, Slick is America

asokra.name: Asokra's Trophy Case
asokra.description:
With so many weekly victories and comp wins under his belt...
We doubt he'll miss a few awards from his collection

koma.name: Koma's Green Penguin of Doom
koma.description: I didn't know penguins could be green... I also didn't know they could breathe fire. Spicy :fire:

ks.name: KS's Lambo
ks.description: He didn't want to actually sell his prized possession so he decided to sell models of it instead

jytesh.name: Jytesh's Chewed Pen
jytesh.description: A pen filled with an ocean blue ink that has some teeth marks on the barrel, presumably from Jytesh stressing over Javascript formatting

earish.name: Earish's Sword
earish.description: Held in a white bag of sorts, holds the true key to the kingdom.

disney.name: Disney's Orca
disney.description:
Yes we're selling Disney's favourite pet Orca...
Don't tell him though.

jon.name: Jon's Inner Eye
jon.description:
Umm... is this even legal?
Allows the user to see into the dimension of creativity.

fuderal.name: Fuderal's Router
fuderal.description:
This gaming router is imported straight from singapore and gives you a whooping 10 gbps with 0 ping
Bad at the game? This will make you a beast.

jypa.name: Jypa's Jeep
jypa.description: Want to get places quick?... like really quick? Jypa's Jeep is the one.

enygmate.name: Enygmate's Baguette
enygmate.description: Don't eat it though..it has been here for quite some time.

kilfy.name: Kilfy's Golden Feather
kilfy.description: Feathers made of gold, how can he fly? nobody knows

vortx.name: Vortx's Golden Birds (Limited)
vortx.description: An extemely rare and expensive limited time collectable, buy it now or you may not get the chance again!
